Literature.Reference: Eur J Med Chem 2019 Oct; 180:143-153.Sci Direct
Literature.Title: Medicinal leech antimicrobial peptides lacking toxicity represent a promising alternative strategy to combat antibiotic-resistant pathogens

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against B. subtilis 168 HT (MIC 40.7 uM), E-coli MG1655 (MIC >81 uM), and C. trachomatis D/UW-3/Cx (MIC90 12.5 uM). Note that whether this is a or part of the natural AMP encoded in the genome remains to be established.   Updated 7/2021
